name: SmartMoteControl
0:
”Alexa, tell smart mote to turn on living room TV.”
”Alexa, tell smart mote to lower volume on living room TV.”
”Alexa, launch smart mote”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart mote
des: This skill allows you to talk to SmartMote universal remote (http://smartmote.me) to control your infrared devices. First, link both this skill and your SmartMote with your Amazon account. Use our smart phone app to add and configure devices you would like to control. Then, you can then use this skill to voice control your infrared devices.
